review: Dont buy it. If you have a choice let Amazon Fire Stick be your last choice. I beg you!!!!!!!
author: Savage

review: It's great, the only addition I would do is for it to accept the apps to navigate internet.
author: Marina Linck

review: thought it would have more network apps available (i.e. abc, cbs, etc) and more TV available for Prime members. More recent movie selections in Prime would be better and more FREE apps
author: Eileen

review: I just got my fire TV stick & it is great.  I am still trying to get to know if I can see all my shows that I have been watching on tv.
author: Jackie
